description.zh_CN: 用于在浏览器环境保存网页文档，方便在没有网络和快速查找网页内容的情况下使用，还能为您节约浏览器的使用内存。
description.en: Stores web pages locally in browsers, enabling offline use and saving browser memory.

是否确认删除所选页面文档?: Are you sure you want to delete the selected page document?
请输入需要查找的标题、内容、网址: Please enter the title, content, or URL you want to search for
暂无搜索数据，请换一个关键词试试吧: No search data found, please try another keyword
保存失败，请刷新页面后重试: Save failed, please refresh the page and try again.
是否确认导出所选页面文档?: Are you sure you want to export the selected page documents?
请输入您需要导入的URL地址: Please enter the URL you wish to import.
导入失败，请确认文档内容后重试: Import failed, please verify document content and try again
请选择需要导入的文档: Please select the document to import
